name: Creeps McGreep's Sideshow Circus
description:
Welcome to the Carnival! Avoid the creepy clown, Creeps McGreeps, and play games to solve  puzzles. the ultimate goal is to escape the carnival!

open ended fun, with lots of puzzles.

Creepy AI follows, sets traps, and captures you to send you back to the fun house.

Dont get caught!

*please not this game is under development. a purchase of this game will go a long way to getting it finished, if you like the game and where it is headed, please refer a friend. if you download the game and your not pleased, no worries, future updates and the finished game will be available to you free of charge  after purchasing the beta.
